title.native: うちの会社の小さい先輩の話
title.romaji: Uchi no Kaisha no Chiisai Senpai no Hanashi

description:
When Shinozaki started his new job, he never expected his superior to be so…cute!? He was struggling to learn the ropes until Katase, his adorably tiny and kind senpai, took him under her wing. She goes above and beyond to ensure Shinozaki feels comfortable—even rubbing his shoulders when he’s tense. But as they grow closer, Shinozaki hopes her devoted attention might mean something more.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
hashtag: #うちの会社の小さい先輩の話
synonyms: Story of a Small Senior in My Company
รุ่นพี่ตัวน้อยดูท่าจะตกหลุมรัก

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Office Lady
tags.description: Prominently features a female office worker or OL.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Nekomimi
tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Cosplay
tags.description: Features dressing up as a different character or profession.

tags.name: Drawing
tags.description: Centers around the art of drawing, including manga and doujinshi.

tags.description: Features people who work in a business office.

They are married to fellow voice actor [Alejandro Saab](https://anilist.co/staff/120666/Alejandro-Saab).

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/danilodinizbr/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/danilodiniz) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/danilodiniz) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/DaniloDinizBR) | [IMDb](https://www.imdb.com/name/nm9906323)

Danilo Diniz de Souza is an actor, voice actor, publicist and dubbing director.

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/conradogalluccisotero/) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/conrado.galluccisotero)

Conrado Gallucci Sotero is a Brazilian actor, voice actor and dubbing director.

[Website](https://yu-ka.jp/) | [Profile (AMUSE)](https://www.amuse.co.jp/artist/A8940/index.html) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yukayu_ka79/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yukayu_ka79) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/yukaYTchannel) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/1mnAFQLFTaUbccNqvK5pqX)

YU-KA is a Japanese singer-songwriter. Born in Okinawa, she spent ages 2-8 in the United States and Switzerland before returning to Japan. She is bilingual in Japanese and English, and her musical style often mixes her Western and Japanese sensibilities.
